title: Build Champ Playstore app discovery platform

requirements.text: Create a backend data model for apps including fields: app ID, name, description, developer name, category, version, file size, rating (0-5 scale), number of reviews, download count, icon URL, screenshots array, and release date
acceptanceCriteria: App type is defined in Motoko with all specified fields
Apps can be created and stored with persistent state
App data can be queried by ID

requirements.text: Implement backend functions to retrieve all apps, get apps by category, search apps by name or developer, and get individual app details by ID
acceptanceCriteria: Query function returns all apps in the store
Category filter returns only apps matching the specified category
Search function returns apps matching name or developer keywords
Get app by ID returns complete app details

requirements.text: Create a backend system for app categories including predefined categories like Games, Social, Productivity, Entertainment, Education, and Tools
acceptanceCriteria: Categories are defined as an enumeration or stable data structure
Each app can be assigned to one category
Function to retrieve all available categories exists

requirements.text: Implement a ratings and reviews system in the backend where users can submit ratings (1-5 stars) and text reviews for apps, with the ability to calculate and update average ratings
acceptanceCriteria: Users can submit a rating and review for an app
Reviews are stored with user identifier, rating, comment text, and timestamp
Average rating is calculated and stored for each app
Reviews can be retrieved for a specific app

requirements.text: Build a home page displaying featured apps, popular apps (sorted by download count), and category sections with horizontal scrollable app cards showing app icon, name, developer, and rating
acceptanceCriteria: Home page renders with distinct sections for featured and popular apps
Each app card displays icon, name, developer, and star rating
Category sections are horizontally scrollable
Page is responsive and works on mobile and desktop

requirements.text: Create a search interface with a prominent search bar that filters apps in real-time as users type, displaying matching results with app icons, names, categories, and ratings
acceptanceCriteria: Search bar is visible and accessible from the main navigation
Search results update dynamically as user types
Results display app icon, name, category, and rating
Clicking a result navigates to the app detail page

requirements.text: Implement category browsing pages showing all apps within a selected category with grid layout, sorting options (by popularity, rating, name), and filtering capabilities
acceptanceCriteria: Category page displays all apps in selected category in a grid layout
Users can sort apps by popularity, rating, or alphabetically
Page navigation works for each predefined category
Grid is responsive across screen sizes

requirements.text: Build detailed app pages showing full app information including large icon, screenshots gallery, full description, developer info, version details, file size, ratings summary, and user reviews list
acceptanceCriteria: App detail page displays all app metadata fields
Screenshots are shown in a gallery or carousel
Ratings are displayed with visual star representation and average score
User reviews are listed with rating, comment, and timestamp
Install/Download button is prominently displayed

requirements.text: Create a review submission interface on app detail pages allowing users to select a star rating and write a text review, then submit it to the backend
acceptanceCriteria: Review form includes star rating selector (1-5 stars)
Text area allows users to write review comments
Submit button posts review to backend
Form validates that rating is selected before submission
Success message shown after successful review submission

requirements.text: Design a vibrant, modern app store interface with a bold color scheme inspired by digital marketplaces, featuring card-based layouts, smooth transitions, clear typography hierarchy, and engaging visual elements that create an inviting browsing experience
acceptanceCriteria: Consistent color palette applied across all pages
Typography uses clear hierarchy with readable fonts
Interactive elements have hover and focus states
Card components have consistent styling with shadows or borders
Overall design feels cohesive and professional

constraints: Use single-actor architecture with all Motoko logic in backend/main.mo
Do not modify immutable frontend paths including useInternetIdentity hooks and UI components
Use React, Tailwind CSS, and React Query for frontend implementation
nonGoals: Actual app downloads or file hosting

required: Modern app store hero banner with vibrant gradient background and digital marketplace theme (hero-banner.dim_1200x400.png)
Placeholder app icon for Games category showing game controller symbol (icon-games.dim_128x128.png)

Placeholder app icon for Entertainment category showing play or media symbol (icon-entertainment.dim_128x128.png)
